DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Huaier ( Trametes robiniophila Murr ) traditional Chinese medicine , widely use China many year . The investigator find Huaier could exert synergistic effect Epirubicin , Cyclophosphamide , Paclitaxel breast cancer cell . It yet know whether combination chemotherapy effective give together Huaier neoadjuvant setting . PURPOSE : To evaluate effect treatment Huaier Granule manage locally advance breast cancer synergistic action neoadjuvant chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy With Without Huaier Granule Treating Women With Locally Advanced Breast Cancer That Can Be Removed By Surgery
